member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.imageClass.title
member.summary: The title of the image, for example "Yahoo! Weather"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.imageClass.link
member.summary: The URL of Yahoo! Weather

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.imageClass.url
member.summary: The URL of the image

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.imageClass.width
member.summary: The width of the image, in pixels

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.imageClass.height
member.summary: The height of the image, in pixels

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.conditionClass.text
member.summary: textual description of conditions, for example, "Partly Cloudy"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.conditionClass.code
member.summary: the condition code for this forecast. You could use this code to choose a text description or image for the forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.conditionClass.temp
member.summary: the current temperature, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.conditionClass.date
member.summary: the current date and time for which this forecast applies. The date is in RFC822 Section 5 format, for example "Wed, 30 Nov 2005 1:56 pm PST"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.locationClass.city
member.summary: city name

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.locationClass.region
member.summary: state, territory, or region, if given

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.locationClass.country
member.summary: two-character country code.

member.name: M:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: US zip code or Location ID.
Units for temperature. f: Fahrenheit c: Celsius

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.unitsClass.temperature
member.summary: degree units, f for Fahrenheit or c for Celsius

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.unitsClass.distance
member.summary: units for distance, mi for miles or km for kilometers

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.unitsClass.pressure
member.summary: units of barometric pressure, in for pounds per square inch or mb for millibars

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.unitsClass.speed
member.summary: units of speed, mph for miles per hour or kph for kilometers per hour

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.astronomyClass.sunrise
member.summary: today's sunrise time. The time is a string in a local time format of "h:mm am/pm", for example "7:02 am"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.astronomyClass.sunset
member.summary: today's sunset time. The time is a string in a local time format of "h:mm am/pm", for example "4:51 pm"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.title
member.summary: The title of the feed, which includes the location city. For example "Yahoo! Weather - Sunnyvale, CA"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.link
member.summary: The URL for the Yahoo! Weather page of the forecast for this location. For example http://us.rd.yahoo.com/dailynews/rss/weather/ Sunnyvale__CA/ *http://xml.weather.yahoo.com/ forecast/94089_f.html

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.language
member.summary: The language of the weather forecast, for example, en-us for US English.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.description
member.summary: The overall description of the feed including the location, for example "Yahoo! Weather for Sunnyvale, CA"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.lastBuildDate
member.summary: The last time the feed was updated. The format is in the date format defined by RFC822 Section 5, for example Mon, 256 Sep 17:25:18 -0700.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.ttl
member.summary: Time to Live; how long in minutes this feed should be cached.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.location
member.summary: The location of this forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.units
member.summary: Units for various aspects of the forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.wind
member.summary: Forecast information about wind.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.atmosphere
member.summary: Forecast information about current atmospheric pressure, humidity, and visibility.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.astronomy
member.summary: Forecast information about current astronomical conditions.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.image
member.summary: The image used to identify this feed

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.item
member.summary: The local weather conditions and forecast for a specific location.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.title
member.summary: The forecast title and time, for example "Conditions for New York, NY at 1:51 pm EST"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.link
member.summary: The Yahoo! Weather URL for this forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.description
member.summary: A simple summary of the current conditions and two-day forecast, in HTML format, including a link to Yahoo! Weather for the full forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.guid
member.summary: Unique identifier for the forecast, made up of the location ID, the date, and the time. The attribute isPermaLink is false.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.pubDate
member.summary: The date and time this forecast was posted, in the date format defined by RFC822 Section 5, for example Mon, 25 Sep 17:25:18 -0700.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.lat
member.summary: The latitude of the location.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.long
member.summary: The longitude of the location

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.condition
member.summary: The longitude of the location

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecast
member.summary: The longitude of the location

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.windClass.chill
member.summary: wind chill in degrees

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.windClass.direction
member.summary: wind direction, in degrees

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.windClass.speed
member.summary: wind speed, in the units specified in the speed attribute of the units element (mph or kph).

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.day
member.summary: day of the week to which this forecast applies. Possible values are Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.date
member.summary: the date to which this forecast applies. The date is in "dd Mmm yyyy" format, for example "30 Nov 2005"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.low
member.summary: the forecasted low temperature for this day, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.high
member.summary: the forecasted high temperature for this day, in the units specified by the units element

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.text
member.summary: a textual description of conditions, for example, "Partly Cloudy"

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.itemClass.forecastClass.code
member.summary: the condition code for this forecast. You could use this code to choose a text description or image for the forecast.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.atmosphereClass.humidity
member.summary: humidity, in percent

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.atmosphereClass.visibility
member.summary: in the units specified by the distance attribute of the units element (mi or km). Note that the visibility is specified as the actual value * 100. For example, a visibility of 16.5 miles will be specified as 1650. A visibility of 14 kilometers will appear as 1400.

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.atmosphereClass.pressure
member.summary: barometric pressure, in the units specified by the pressure attribute of the units element (in or mb).

member.name: P:YahooWeatherLib.YahooWeatherForecast.rssClass.channelClass.atmosphereClass.rising
member.summary: state of the barometric pressure, steady = 0, rising = 1, falling = 2
